```{r}
#make a basic graph

iris_plot = ggplot(iris, aes(x = Petal.Length, y = Petal.Width))+
  geom_point(aes(color = "blue", shape = Species)) +
  labs(x = "Petal Length (mm)", y = "Petal Width (mm)") +
  theme_classic() #removed gridlines 

iris_plot
```
